languages.text: {n}Октавиана показывает пустую бутыль и виновато разводит руками.{/n} "Простите, {mf|господин|госпожа}, это последняя бутыль того года. Что сказать, мы все страдаем от прерывающихся поставок на Футфол".

traits.locale_text: {n}Октавиана показывает пустую бутыль и виновато разводит руками.{/n} "Простите, {mf|господин|госпожа}, это последняя бутыль того года. Что сказать, мы все страдаем от прерывающихся поставок на Футфол".

languages.text: {n}Octaviana shows you an empty bottle and makes a helpless gesture.{/n} "I'm sorry, {mf|sir|ma'am}, this was the last bottle of that year. What can I say — we're all feeling the brunt of Footfall's shipment problems."
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана показывает пустую бутыль и виновато разводит руками.{/n} "Простите, {mf|господин|госпожа}, это последняя бутыль того года. Что сказать, мы все страдаем от прерывающихся поставок на Футфол".

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana shows you an empty bottle and makes a helpless gesture.{/n} "I'm sorry, {mf|sir|ma'am}, this was the last bottle of that year. What can I say — we all feel Footfall's shipment cutoffs."
{n}Octaviana shows you an empty bottle and makes a helpless gesture.{/n} "I'm sorry, {mf|sir|ma'am}, this was the last bottle of that year. What can I say — we all feel Footfall's shipment cutoffs."

{n}Octaviana shows you an empty bottle and makes a helpless gesture.{/n} "I'm sorry, {mf|sir|ma'am}, this was the last bottle of that year. What can I say — we're all feeling the brunt of Footfall's shipment problems."

{n}Octaviana shows you an empty bottle and makes a helpless gesture.{/n} "I'm sorry, {mf|sir|ma'am}, this was the last bottle of that year. What can I say — we're all feeling the brunt of Footfall's shipment problems."

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜拿出个空瓶子，做了个无奈的手势。{/n}“很抱歉，{mf|先生|女士}，这就是当年剩下的最后一瓶了。我还能说些什么呢？落脚港的货运问题，对我们所有人都造成了冲击。”
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana shows you an empty bottle and makes a helpless gesture.{/n} "I'm sorry, {mf|sir|ma'am}, this was the last bottle of that year. What can I say — we're all feeling the brunt of Footfall's shipment problems."

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜拿出个空瓶子，做了个无奈的手势。{/n}“很抱歉，{mf|先生|女士}，这就是当年剩下的最后一瓶了。我还能说些什么呢？落脚港的货运问题，对我们所有人都造成了冲击。”

languages.text: {n}Octaviana te muestra una botella vacía y realiza un gesto de impotencia.{/n} «Lo siento, {mf|señor|señora}, era la última botella de ese año. No sé qué decir, a todos nos afectan los problemas logísticos que hay en Paso».
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana shows you an empty bottle and makes a helpless gesture.{/n} "I'm sorry, {mf|sir|ma'am}, this was the last bottle of that year. What can I say — we're all feeling the brunt of Footfall's shipment problems."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana te muestra una botella vacía y realiza un gesto de impotencia.{/n} «Lo siento, {mf|señor|señora}, era la última botella de ese año. No sé qué decir, a todos nos afectan los problemas logísticos que hay en Paso».

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナは空っぽのボトルを見せて、仕方なさそうな仕草をした。{/n}「悪いね、{mf|旦那|姐さん}、これがその年の最後のボトルだ。皆フットフォールの輸送問題に悩まされてんのさ」
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana shows you an empty bottle and makes a helpless gesture.{/n} "I'm sorry, {mf|sir|ma'am}, this was the last bottle of that year. What can I say — we're all feeling the brunt of Footfall's shipment problems."

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナは空っぽのボトルを見せて、仕方なさそうな仕草をした。{/n}「悪いね、{mf|旦那|姐さん}、これがその年の最後のボトルだ。皆フットフォールの輸送問題に悩まされてんのさ」

languages.text: {n}Octaviana zeigt dir eine leere Flasche und macht eine hilflose Geste.{/n} "Es tut mir leid, {mf|Sir|Madam}, aber das war die letzte Flasche dieses Jahrgangs. Was soll ich sagen – wir alle leiden unter den Lieferengpässen auf Footfall."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana shows you an empty bottle and makes a helpless gesture.{/n} "I'm sorry, {mf|sir|ma'am}, this was the last bottle of that year. What can I say — we're all feeling the brunt of Footfall's shipment problems."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana zeigt dir eine leere Flasche und macht eine hilflose Geste.{/n} "Es tut mir leid, {mf|Sir|Madam}, aber das war die letzte Flasche dieses Jahrgangs. Was soll ich sagen – wir alle leiden unter den Lieferengpässen auf Footfall."

languages.text: {n}Octaviana vous indique une bouteille vide d'un geste impuissant.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|m'sire|ma'ame}, c'était la dernière bouteille de ce cru-là. Qu'est-ce que vous voulez... On est tous victimes des problèmes d'approvisionnement de Castel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana shows you an empty bottle and makes a helpless gesture.{/n} "I'm sorry, {mf|sir|ma'am}, this was the last bottle of that year. What can I say — we're all feeling the brunt of Footfall's shipment problems."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana vous indique une bouteille vide d'un geste impuissant.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|m'sire|ma'ame}, c'était la dernière bouteille de ce cru-là. Qu'est-ce que vous voulez... On est tous victimes des problèmes d'approvisionnement de Castel. »

languages.text: {n}Octaviana sana boş bir şişe gösterip elinden gelen bir şey olmadığını jestleriyle anlatıyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}, o yıldan kalan son şişe buydu. Ne diyebilirim ki, Binliman'ın nakliyat sıkıntıları herkesi vurdu."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana shows you an empty bottle and makes a helpless gesture.{/n} "I'm sorry, {mf|sir|ma'am}, this was the last bottle of that year. What can I say — we're all feeling the brunt of Footfall's shipment problems."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana sana boş bir şişe gösterip elinden gelen hiçbir şey olmadığını jestleriyle anlatıyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}, o yıldan kalan son şişe buydu. Ne diyebilirim ki... Binliman'ın nakliyat sıkıntıları herkesi vurdu."
